title: Bug 118780: Incorrect column names displayed in expression builder when selecting dataset with aliases
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the assigned column aliases.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Create a new datasource and dataset. 2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. Ensure that the assigned alias 'column1' is displayed instead of the old column name.
